newsitem.title: ARGENTINA: Banco Frances says buys 71.8% of Credito Argentino.
newsitem.headline: Banco Frances says buys 71.8% of Credito Argentino.

text.p: Argentina's Banco Frances said it signed Friday a deal to buy a 71.8 percent stake at Banco de Credito Argentino (BCA).
The deal is subject to Argentina's Central Bank approval, Banco Frances told the Buenos Aires Stock Exchange.
It did not disclose the amount of the deal.
